_sText:
Most of the Aztec ruins got destroyed in the terrorist attack in 1986. The US military build a hub for their underground facility where the Aztec temples used to be. Little is left from the once holy place.

The year is 2047 and terrorists are going to attack again. Will you join them or will you fight them?!

The Terrorists need to open the gate to the underground military facility. In order to do that they need to bomb either the powerhouse that fuels the gate with electricity or directly bomb the heavy metal gate.

The Counter Terrorists need to prevent the bombing and eradicate all terrorist members.

Good luck and have fun soldier!
